mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLIENTBOX WHERE PRODUCT_COUNT IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLIENTBOX(PRODUCT_MODEL, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_ID) SELECT P.PRODUCT_MODEL, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_ID FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN CLIENTBOX C ON P.PRODUCT_MODEL = C.PRODUCT_MODEL WHERE C.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} IS NULL;
